settings.heading: Inspired Design
settings.sub_text: From concept to installation, we'll help you transform any living space into a destination for connection and well-being.

settings.title: PLAN YOUR PROJECT
settings.content:
Whether you explore our products online or in the showroom, you'll find all the tools, materials, and styles to ensure your new fireplace expresses your vision.

We've helped bring friends and family together around the fire for more than 70 years. So when you partner with our team, you can always expect quality products, services, and support.

settings.title: CONVERT WOOD TO GAS
settings.text:
Convert your wood fireplace to gas and experience greater performance, safety, and convenience. 

Projects start around $4,800.

settings.title: ADD A NEW FIREPLACE
settings.text:
Add a new fireplace where one doesn’t exist for a warmth and comfort upgrade indoors or outdoors.

Projects start around $6,700.

settings.title: REPLACE YOUR FIREPLACE
settings.text:
Replace your existing fireplace to match the evolving style and technology of your home. 

Projects start around $6,900.
Our process is simple. Once you share your fireplace dreams with us, we'll provide you with hand-picked customized solutions to make the selection easy and fun.
Our qualified and experienced professionals will guide you through every aspect of selection, installation, and service, so you get your dream fireplace.
We're proud to carry the best-selling fireplace brands. You'll enjoy award-winning designs and technology plus the peace of mind knowing your fireplace is built to last.

settings.title: You Dream It. We Build It.
Fill Out a Project Checklist
settings.text: This will help our showroom sales consultants better understand your project and give it a jump start.

settings.title: Take Pictures of Your Space
settings.text: Take 2-3 pictures of the room where the project will take place. We also encourage you to bring any inspirational photos.

settings.title: Visit A Fireside Showroom
settings.text: Bring your project checklist and photos to a Fireside showroom. Our sales consultants are happily waiting to help.

settings.title: Get Started Today
settings.sub_text: We offer free in-home and virtual consults, as well as convenient and beautiful showrooms to inspire your project. To get the most value out of our first meeting, we recommend completing a few simple steps:

settings.title: Ready to Convert, Add or Replace Your Fireplace?
settings.content:
We want you to feel confident throughout your project and excited to take the next step toward your dream design. 

We'll help you find the best solutions to complement your renovation or new build.

settings.newsletter_text: Be the first to get a sneak peek at the latest innovations in fireplace design and installation. Subscribe to our newsletter to view recent work, meet our designers, and inspire your next project. You'll also be the first to know about special promotions and exciting discounts to help you plan your fireplace.
